scripts.ba: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.ra: rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-hdpi &&  rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-mdpi &&  rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xhdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xxhdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xxxhdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/raw && npx jetify
scripts.androidProductionReleaseBundle: yarn clean && cd android && ./gradlew bundleProductionRelease && killall -9 java && open ./android/app/build/outputs/bundle/production/release
